No $50 setup fee for a limited time!

VitalServer offers Virtual Dedicated/Private Servers starting at $50/month. Our VPSs offer you *full* root (Administrator) access, 25GB+/Month or greater bandwidth capability, *unlimited* domains/users/bandwidth transfer, your own DNS server, control panels, customized software/configurations, and more!

Step up to the new standard in virtual hosting!
